channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘I don’t trust my financial guy.’ I’m 67 and trying to live on $2.2K-a-month Social Security. I have $500K with an adviser, who charges 2%, but last year the return was 26%. What’s my move?
item.description: We spotted a lot of too-common red flags.

item.title: If voters think like economists, Harris has the edge, but if they focus on sticker shock, Trump will win, this expert says
item.description: With just 12 days left in a tight presidential race, all sorts of prediction models are getting attention. Oxford Economics offered two financially-fo...

item.title: PayPal Knows Your Pants Size---and Will Share It With Marketers
item.description: The payments company is joining other finance firms in the vast market for customer data.

item.title: OPEC+ Isn't Expected to Hike Oil Output Until 3Q 2025, BNP Paribas Says
item.description: OPEC and its allies aren’t expected to start raising oil output until the third quarter of 2025 due to continued market weakness, BNP Paribas said, ad...

item.title: Cut Your 2024 Taxes Before It's Too Late
item.description: The end of the year is weeks away. To improve your tax picture for 2024, act now.

item.title: Big Food Is Learning to Love Weight-Loss Drugs
item.description: Companies are figuring out how to cater to consumers using GLP-1 drugs, such as Ozempic.

item.title: ‘I can feel myself getting older as I type this.’ I’m 68 and ready to retire. I have $55K in savings but my pensions are underfunded. What now?
item.description: Have an issue with your financial adviser or looking for a new one? Email questions or concerns to picks@marketwatch.com.

item.title: ‘I haven’t had a vacation in 10 years’: I’m 69, retired, single and have $3.6 million. What should I do with my fortune — leave it all to charity?
item.description: “Many weeks I spend more on my three rescue kitties and one rescue mouse than I do on myself.”

item.title: ‘Who do people like me turn to?’ I am 70 with absolutely no emergency or retirement savings. So now what?
item.description: Have an issue with your financial adviser or looking for a new one? Email questions or concerns to picks@marketwatch.com. We’ll have financial adviser...

item.title: Gold Futures Slip as Profit-taking Kicks In
item.description: Gold futures edged down and Pepperstone said the recent dip is likely to be a temporary price-consolidation phase and partially reflects rising bond y...
